attributes.action: TELL US how many UK taxpayer pounds the new Nissan Quashcai has cost the taxpayers (no politicians included) of this country.
attributes.additional_details: It can be relied upon that we UK taxpayers have more at risk on the Quashcai than Nissan will EVER have.  None of the news reports have told us just how much this car will cost us.  We NEED to be told.
